name: Engorge
description:
You are a thirsty boy craving the blood of the innocent. Engorge yourself or perish and waste your newly found power.

CONTROLS:

W A S D to move.

Left click to dash attack.

Should you fail, press R to restart.

Press Esc to close the game.

GRAPHICS:

https://gfycat.com/handmadepalatablealligatorsnappingturtle

GAMEPLAY: 

https://gfycat.com/vengefulnauticalbluebreastedkookaburra

Thanks for playing!
